SELECT ,sw.warehouse_name as 'warehouseName',smc.material_category_name as 'materialCategoryName',sm.material_code as 'materialCode', sm.material_name as 'materialName',sm.material_desc as 'materialDesc',sm.version, su.user_name create_user_name,sus.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM olt_safe_stock os LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse sw ON os.warehouse_id=sw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN smt_material_category smc ON os.material_category_id = smc.material_category_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm ON os.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON os.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON os.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON os.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and sw.warehouse_name Like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName},'%',)
and smc.material_category_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialCategoryName},'%')
and sm.material_id = #{materialId}
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%',#{materialDesc},'%')
order by os.create_time desc

SELECT sum(ssi.quantity) FROM smt_storage_inventory ssi LEFT JOIN base_tab bt ON ssi.material_id = bt.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_material_category smc ON bt.material_type = smc.material_category_id WHERE smc.material_category_id= #{materialCategoryId}
SELECT sum(quantity) FROM smt_storage_inventory where material_id =#{materialId}
